name: Jimmy wants to break BLOCKS
description:
Jimmy Wants to Break BLOCKS!

Game controls

[wasd], [arrow key]- move
[s], [down arrow key] - sneak, (mid air)fall down
[x], [mouse left click] - dash
[space] - jump, double-jump
[p] - pause on / off

Game rules

  1. dash to the block
  2. if Jimmy’s and the block’s colors match, all linked blocks breaks
  3. if Jimmy’s and the block’s colors don’t match, they swap colors and more blocks drops
  4. if Jimmy breaks blocks, Jimmy’s color cycles to the next one

Game over rules

  1. if a block squeezes Jimmy
  2. if blocks overflow the game window

made by RockSolid Group.

Programming - KimBap (Discord - ybs1164#2306)
Graphic Design - Chicken (Discord - 정원#6262)
SFX, SoundTracks - Waffle (Discord - DeepBlue#6795)
